About me

Hi, my name is Jakson Rochelly, I'm a 23 years old passionate web developer who likes to code using ruby/rails and make cool stuff.

Currently I'm working at ATS where I develop internal web apps, trying to bring better usability to them.

I'm the kind of guy who likes to discover about the world, specially the tech one. Traveling around the globe is one of my wishes, but for me, what matter most is to be surrounded by good people.

I really enjoy coding. Making programs others can use is a big challenge, but even thus, it's awesome! :D

Apps I've built

Multilinks Shortcut

Open your daily common pages at once with this extension for Google Chrome.

Convercy

Just another Currency converter.

Where to find me

There are a lot of places you can find me, I'm really open to conversation, so feel free to mail me on jrochelly@gmail.com. If you want a easier way to get in touch with me, maybe twitter would be better, but you can also find me on facebook.
